articles.author: Eric W. Dolan
articles.title: "Don't put garlic in your nose": The dangers of sinusitis misinformation on TikTok - PsyPost
articles.description: A study reveals that nearly half of TikTok's sinusitis-related videos contain misinformation, mostly propagated by non-medical influencers. This poses risks as viewers may turn to ineffective treatments instead of seeking professional medical advice.
